name: Recroot
description: Video-based hiring tool for high-churn hospitality chains and franchises, where jobseekers apply to hourly job openings by recording a 30-second video. Trusted by Starbucks, TGI Fridays, and Hard Rock Cafe. #hiring #HRtech #video #jobs
